name: ClinicalIdentifier
label: Clinical identifier
description: A unique proper name or character sequence that identifies this particular clinical examination. (NCIT:C87853)

name: BelongsToPerson
label: Belongs to person
description: Reference to the person whom this clinical information is about. (IAO:0000136)

name: Phenotype
label: Phenotype
description: The outward appearance of the individual. In medical context, these are often the symptoms caused by a disease. (NCIT:C16977)

name: UnobservedPhenotype
label: Unobserved phenotype
description: Phenotypes or symptoms that were looked for but not observed, which may help in differential diagnosis or establish incomplete penetrance. (HL7:C0442737)

name: PhenotypicDataAvailable
label: Phenotypic data available
description: Types of phenotypic data collected in a clinical setting that is potentially available upon request. (NCIT:C15783)

name: ClinicalDiagnosis
label: Clinical diagnosis
description: A diagnosis made from a study of the signs and symptoms of a disease. (NCIT:C15607)

name: MolecularDiagnosisGene
label: Molecular diagnosis gene
description: Gene affected by pathogenic variation that is causal for disease of the patient. (NCIT:C20826)

name: MolecularDiagnosisOther
label: Molecular diagnosis other
description: Causal variant in HGVS notation with optional classification or free text explaining any other molecular mechanisms involved. (NCIT:C20826)

name: AgeAtDiagnosis
label: Age at diagnosis
description: The age, measured from some defined time point (e.g. birth) at which a patient is diagnosed with a disease. (SNOMEDCT:423493009)

name: AgeAtLastScreening
label: Age at last screening
description: Age of the patient at the moment of the most recent screening. (NCIT:C81258)

name: Medication
label: Medication
description: A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients used by the patient intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. Any hormone therapies, gender-related or otherwise, should also be recorded here. (NCIT:C459)

name: DrugRegimen
label: Drug regimen
description: The specific way a therapeutic drug is to be taken, including formulation, route of administration, dose, dosing interval, and treatment duration. (NCIT:C142516)

name: FamilyMembersAffected
label: Family members affected
description: Family members related by descent rather than by marriage or law who were diagnosed with the same condition as the individual who is the primary focus of investigation (i.e. the proband). (HP:0032320)

name: FamilyMembersSequenced
label: Family members sequenced
description: Family members related by descent rather than by marriage or law who were also tested by next-generation sequencing. (NCIT:C79916)

name: MedicalHistory
label: Medical history
description: A record of a person's background regarding health, occurrence of disease events and surgical procedures. (NCIT:C18772)

name: AgeOfOnset
label: Age of onset
description: Age of onset of clinical manifestations related to the disease of the patient. (Orphanet:C023)

name: FirstContact
label: First contact
description: First contact of the patient with a specialised center in context of disease or study inclusion. (LOINC:MTHU048806)

name: Functioning
label: Functioning
description: Patient's classification of functioning i.e. disability profile according to International Classification of Functioning and Disability (ICF). (NCIT:C21007)

name: MaterialUsedInDiagnosis
label: Material used in diagnosis
description: This diagnosis c.q. clinical examination is based on one or more sampled materials. (SIO:000641)
